name: 4th Snail Indoor World Championship
description:
4th Snail Indoor World Championship - the only racing game where you don't have to watch the road!

  • includes robot commentary
  • play with your computer or with your friends
  • get competitive or simply relax and enjoy a nice sports event
Controls:
  • 'A' - Player 1
  • 'L' - Player 2

This game has been created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37.
